summary: This is my personal version of NLA. I tweaked many of the colors, darker greens, colder look, and natural base colors, trying to emphasize realism.
descriptionHtml:
Requires the latest ENB files AS WELL AS the esp from Natural Lighting and Atmospherics. 

https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065?tab=files

-Download the first option manually.
-Unpack it 
-Only get the esp, copy it
-Place it in your data folder of skyrim (it is located where you installed skyrim and is under Steam>steamapps>common>skyrim>data(PLACE ESP HERE)

-Download the latest ENB files, go to wrapper version when you open the archive, copy and paste D3d11 and enbhost to your skyrim     directory Steam>steamapps>common>skyrim (PLACE HERE)

http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html

-Download my crap
-Copy all files and paste in Skyrim Directory

DONE

[color=#ff0000]Update 1.2
[/color][color=#00ffff]-Nights look much more fantasy like, more mist and brighter horizon.
-More customization to the enb so that there is sharpening, blur, and vinnigetting are now available.
-Lens and DOF have been modified
-Mornings now have a bit of a fog to mimic fogs on the coast 
-Update to the colors, more saturated yet realistic
-Big update to the environmental lighting much more natural[/color]
author: Skylanator
